story.author: Amanoxic778
story.headline: Heavy Metal Musicians Make Contact with Aliens
story.subheading: Metal Band Electric Sludge Encounters Visitors from Beyond!

article.p: Recently the heavy metal band, Electric Sludge Man, was shooting a music video in the Nevada desert.

Just as they were about to start filming the guitar solo, a giant hovercraft flew over them, dropping down a disco ball and lighting up the band. “It was surreal, man. It was like the whole universe was jamming,” said the lead guitar player.
The band wanted to release the footage, however, they forgot to hit the record button.
